entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
